alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 14 at 3:58AM CDT until October 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM CDT SATURDAY... .A drier airmass will filter into the region late tonight into Saturday. Gusty northwest winds are also anticipated. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR AREAS OVER SW LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, Northern Calcasieu and Northern Jefferson Davis. * TIMING...Noon to 7 PM CDT Saturday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 30 percent. * WIND...north to northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts possibly up to 25 mph. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Burn Bans are in effect.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon
